title: Apache Iceberg Sink Connector
name: iceberg-kafka-connect
description: The Apache Iceberg Sink Connector for Kafka Connect is a sink connector for writing data from Kafka into Iceberg tables.

support.summary: Support for this connector is provided by the Iceberg open source community. You can open an issue in the Iceberg GitHub repo or post a question in the Iceberg Slack workspace in the #kafka-connect channel.
